column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2022
column14: I love this lipstick. It glides on smoothly and lasts for hours. I get so many compliments when I wear it. The pigmentation is perfect for my melanin.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2019
column14: Arrived with only one side sealed. The clear balm part was sealed, however, the lip gloss part was not. Have no clue if this is used or what. I will not be risking it though. In the trash it goes. ☹️

column6: 'FLAMABLE' is the warning on my (unsealed) tube!! NO THANKS
column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2021
column14: I've worn lipsticks, balms, and stains since 1972.  And, I'm a retired cosmetologist/aesthetician.  I have a couple of long-wearing products that have been in my arsenal for the last five years.  After reading all the hoopla about this item, I decided to try it.  However, I cannot remember ever opening a box and finding a new cosmetic item 'NWOB' that wasn't clear in the description.  I avoid them...AND, I cannot recall a tube ever having a CAUTION: FLAMMABLE warning next to the color name and code!!  WTH??!!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2020
Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2021
column14: I’ve been using L’Oréal infallible lip color for five years; I have yet to find a better lip stain. It really is kiss proof, eat/drink proof too. Stays on for many hours and sometimes to the next day if you don’t try to remove. It removes easily with any oil or make up remover, or even a firm hand with a baby wipe. Love their color selection too.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2022
column14: Love this long-lasting lip color. Great color, lasts all day, and doesn't melt in my purse. Thank you L'Oreal!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2021
column14: I love this lipstick. I read the reviews some reported the product wasn't sealed yet I took a chance and ordered one.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2018
column14: I love this lipstick and have been using it for years, ever since they had it in the little rectangular thingy. My only complaint is that they tend to discontinue my favorite color after a while and I have to find a new one!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
column14: It can be a little drying  but keep putting the gloss on. My color is 117 and I love it!
